name: CDS-curbs-spaces
description:
This dataset cannot be used seperately. It needs to be combined with policy, events of metrics. Defines individual demarcated spaces within a Curb Zone. Important notes about Curb Spaces:
  1. Curb Spaces may NOT overlap with other Curb Spaces
  2. Curb Spaces must be wholly contained within a single Curb Zone
  3. Unlike Zones, Spaces may be updated as needed, with a new curb_space_id being optionally assigned by the city
